text: My Secret Life may refer to: * My Secret Life (memoir), by "Walter", the memoir of a Victorian gentleman's sexual development and experiences * My Secret Life (Sonia Dada album), 1998 * My Secret Life (Eric Burdon album), 2004 * My Secret Life (Billy Ruffian album), 2007 * My Secret Life (Julee Cruise album), 2011
title: My Secret Life
